overview:
Aditya is currently working as an Analyst on the Corporate Strategy & Development team at Intuit focused on driving organic and inorganic growth opportunities for Intuit.

Prior to that, he did a 2 year Leadership Development Program at Intuit and held various Marketing & Product Management roles in their Enterprise, QuickBooks Online, and Financial Institution Mobile Banking divisions.

While studying at Stanford, Aditya started a business named “Cracking Admissions in Colleges Abroad (CACA) that helped assist Indian students apply to universities abroad. He successfully partnered with Reliance, one of India’s largest companies, to launch the product at 250 web centers in 110 cities across India.

He eventually published a book around the same concept to help guide Indian students wanting to study abroad. The book is available online and at all leading Indian bookstores - Title: “Cracking Admissions in Colleges Abroad”
